attributes.action: pass an Act of Parliament, which declares parades and or festivals promoting homosexuality and or other degenerate acts and or lifestyles to be illegal, as they offend common public decency, and corrupt simple and or easily lead people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Great Britain ask the Prime Minister Gordon Brown to pass an Act of Parliament, which declares festivals and or parades promoting homosexuality and or other degenerate lifestyles to be illegal, as they offend common public decency, and corrupt easily lead and or simple people.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
